about_the_game:
JOHNNY ROCKETFINGERS 1 & 2, GAME COLLECTION!!

The internet smash hit Point & Click Adventure game, "Johnny Rocketfingers," is finally available to play directly from your desktop computer!

With over 50 million+ plays world wide this viral Stick Figure flash game won the hearts of everyone who played it on Newgrounds back during it's debut in 2003!

Enjoy replaying this classic series or playing for the first time!

In this adventure game series you control the character of Johnny Rocketfingers. Move your cursor carefully around environments to walk through and explore your surroundings. Click on items you find on-screen to pick them up. These items go in your inventory for the use of solving in-game puzzles. Talk to characters to get clues for what to do next on your missions. This is your standard Point & Click Puzzle Adventure game but with a violent, gritty, Tarantino-esque twist - inspired by Monkey Island, Lucasarts and Sierra games of the 90's. Also inspired by films such as Pulp Fiction, Goodfellas and Menace II Society.

WARNING: This game series is not recommended for young audiences or sensitive players. Contains extremely Crude Humor, Violence, Vulgar Language, Sexual Innuendos. Depictions of sexual acts and extreme violence. Depictions of drug and alcohol abuse.

content_descriptors.notes: Crude Humor, Violence, Vulgar Language, Sexual Innuendos. Depictions of sexual acts and extreme violence. Depictions of drug and alcohol abuse.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: 1 gigahertz
  • Memory: 250 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows
  • VR Support: N/A

5/5 – Games Freezer
